title: If the height of any building constructed under URS is more than 32 m, marginal open space of 6 m or as required by CFO whichever is greater shall be maintained
clause_text: If the height of any building constructed under URS is more than 32 m, marginal open space of 6 m or as required by CFO whichever is greater shall be maintained.
section: Relaxation in Building and other requirements:-
